categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The Loratus Hover Transport TC9 was a cargo vehicle.

The TC9 was manufactured by Loratus Manufacturing and was a hover vehicle capable of fast speeds. This armored troop transport had front-mounted anti-armor blasters, and could carry up to six troopers.

It was used by the Rebel Alliance during the early stages of the Galactic Civil War and a group of smugglers and mercenaries affiliated with the Disciples of Ragnos, later in the war. The transports were later used by the New Republic to speedily evacuate friendly-personnel, such as escaped prisoners, from enemy bases. They were deployed to evacuate the revolting prisoners and Kyle Katarn during the Battle of Artus Prime.

On a mission to Mos Eisley in 14 ABY, Kyle Katarn and Jaden Korr discovered a couple of TC9s. They would later run into them again, as the mercenaries used them for transporting personnel when they hijacked a cargo tram on Corellia.
